content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content: Hello Aziz! Thank you for coming to see the apartment. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content:
My proposed rental price is 850 Euros per month.

What is your response?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your proposal, Mister Heine. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I would need to see the apartment and consider other factors before coming to a final decision. May I take a look around the apartment first?
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content:
Sure, you can take a look around the apartment. What is your final answer?

I agree to the price of 850 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for considering my proposal, Aziz. After taking a closer look at the apartment and considering other factors, I am willing to accept the rental price of 850 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
name: Aziz Trabelsi
